name: SteamShock Demo
description:
You are not a Hero, but a Bounty Hunter from SteamLand, the Human Civilization and you are currently Living in the 

Blue Empire's Territories, searching for the Rewards that the Empire Pays for every enemy defeated, 
trying to find the Path for the Big Reward (The Bosses)

Your Goal is not to Save the World, but get Some Money to Survive a War Economy With High Inflation, Big Taxes and an Evil
Totalitarian Government who is trying to Take Over the World and Destroy the Other Totalitarian Empire who wants the same.

You are a Massive Red Empire's Invasion, so there is so much Work to do, in order to eat something, but in this Adventure 
others Bounty Hunters will try to bet you in order to get the Rewards for himself and his team.
